trigger.tip5: The note will be sent to recipients when your master time up
trigger.tip6: The note will be sent to recipients by this specific time
trigger.tip1: You can set a condition and recipients for this note, when the condition triggered, the note will be sent to the recipients
trigger.tipAddTrigger1: You didn't add the send condition trigger, the note will not be sent. Please add a trigger to send
trigger.tipTrigger1: Set a condition to trigger the note to recipient

task.title: Title
task.tipDelete2: The task cannot be recovered after you delete it!
task.tip1: Important and urgent, do it now!
task.tip2: Important but not urgent, do it whenever you have time
task.tip3: Urgent but not important, let other people to handle
task.tip4: Don't waste your time on it

antiDelayNote.title: Anti-Delay-Note
antiDelayNote.yesterday: Please write some happy moment yesterday
antiDelayNote.tipYesterday: Write down three things that made you happy yesterday, things that you want to be grateful for, and things that feel particularly good. (Recording positive emotions guides us to stay positive, kind of like a gratitude journal.)
antiDelayNote.tipMyThought: Aiming at the above things, write down your corresponding thoughts. Talk to yourself objectively and calmly, develop metacognition skills, and better understand yourself.
antiDelayNote.tipLongGoal1: Who do you want to be in 7 years?
antiDelayNote.tipLongGoal2: What do you need to do for this?
antiDelayNote.tipLongGoal3: What goals do you have to accomplish this year?
antiDelayNote.tipLongGoal4: How do you achieve this goal?
antiDelayNote.whatToDoToday: So what do you have to do today?
antiDelayNote.tipTodayGoal: In order to achieve your long term goal, what do you must do for it, and you must handle it today.
antiDelayNote.tip10SecAction: List the task todolist, what you can start it in 10 seconds
antiDelayNote.tipNoAntiDelayNote: You haven't created any anti-procrastination note yet, trust me, this will definitely work for you
antiDelayNote.modalDeleteTip1: Are you sure to delete this note？ It cannot be recoverd after delete!

dashboard.tip3: After the timer up, your message will be sent out
dashboard.tip4: Click Snooze, you can reset the timer

myProfile.tip1: Bind an email, if this email already exist, switch to this email account
myProfile.tipNoEmail: You have not bind your email, for your data safety, please bind one.
myProfile.tipTitleLoginName: You can sign in account by login name and password
myProfile.tipNoLoginName: You have not set your login name and password yet.
myProfile.tipSetLoginNameSuccess: Set login name and password success

noteSent.tipNoteSend2: You can set a email who you want to send, The system will send to the email directly
noteSent.tipNoteSend3: For the security and privacy, you need to set a encode key, we will encrypt note use this encode key. And you also need to tell this encode key to recipient, because she/he need input this key to decrypt the note.
noteSent.tipTitle: The note title will display to recipient
noteSent.tipRecipientEmail: Email of who you want to send
noteSent.tipFromName: This name will display to receive user
noteSent.tipToName: The name of person who you want to send
noteSent.tip2: For your private safe, please set a code to encrypt the note. No one can read this note except you give them this code
noteSent.tipEncodeWarn1: Warning! Please remember this code, if you fotget it, there will be no way to find it back!
noteSent.tipEncode2: If you don't wanna set encrypt key, just leave it empty
noteSent.tipNoEmail: You must specify the receiver email
noteSent.tipCodecKey: If you set this codec, that's means the note will be encrypted by this codec and receiver need to input this code to read the note
noteSent.title: Title
noteSent.tipEncrypt: This is HI-TOP-SECRET encrypt note, you must contact sender to obtain decrypt code to decipher the message
noteSent.tipSendContent: This content will be send to recipient
noteSent.tipNoToName: Please input the name who you want to send
noteSent.tipNoContent: You cannot send an empty note

home.tip2: LifeCapsule is a tool for you to record your life and share with others
